net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.name: Lib:Licensing
net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.notes:
1) Copy Campaign Macros to Campain Maco Window and execute token macros from there.
2) To Add, Delete, or Replace licenses from the license library use the macros on the Lib token.

net.rptools.CaseInsensitiveHashMap_-KeyV.value: {"CSP/Kristian_richards":"This map-pack is Copyright Â© Kristian Richards 2020 If you would like to know more about my various projects please visit... The Crooked Staff Blog: http://crookedstaff.blogspot.com DriveThruRPG: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/browse/pub/3785/Crooked-Staff-Publishing Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/CrookedStaffTerrain Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/csp_kris Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/crookedstaff Note that these maps are provided under a Creative Commons - Attribution - Non-commercial - Share Alike license. The full details of the license can be found here: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0","Bogie's Art&Maps":"Bogie's Art & Map Packs If you like these maps, mapping objects and textures, please visit RpgMapshare.com and Dundjinni.com Forums to see more. If you would like to purchase other maps, please check out the marketplace at CreativeGremlins.com. These maps and ArtPacks are provided under a Creative Commons - Attribution - Non-Commercial - Share Alike License. Essentially it means that you can edit them, redistribute them and do what you like with them, as long as you don't sell them and you credit me when they re-appear on the internet. Any redistribution version has to come with the same license. The full details of the license can be found here: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/ If you wish to use any of this art for commercial purposes or have special requests for custom maps, please contact me at bogiemaps@gmail.com","Torstan":"Torstan's Assets If you like these maps and would like to see more like them, then please visit my website www.fantasticmaps.com or my maps on RPGNow: www.tinyurl.com/fantasticmaps These maps are provided under a Creative Commons - Attribution - Non-commercial - Share Alike license. Essentially it means that you can edit them, redistribute them and do what you like with them, as long as you don't sell them and you credit me when they re-appear on the internet. Any redistributed version has to come with the same license. The full details of the license can be found here: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/","Phergus Markers":"Simple Markers created in GIMP (https://www.gimp.org/) using the Copperplate Gothic Bold font. Mystical Markers created in GIMP (https://www.gimp.org/) using the Alchemy font by Kenneth Hirst. Created for use in MapTool (https://www.rptools.net) but may be used wherever and however you like. Contact Phergus on the MapTool Discord server and RPTools.net forums. 2019-12-24","Dorpond":"These images were created by Dorpond (Bill Hart) using Tree[d] for maptool 1.3. They are licensed for re-use and distribution under the Creative Commons share-alike, non-commercial, attribution license: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/ I used tree[d] to create these trees by permission of the developer. Check it out here: http://www.frecle.net/index.php?show=treed.about","Greytale":"License These images are the property/copyright of greytale.com and Greg Taylor, and are licensed for use within Maptool. They may be used for personal use only, and may not be redistributed, modified, or used for commercial purposes without permission. If you wish to modify, use them commercially, or distribute them as a free pack, please notify us of their intended use at: greytalesnook@gmail.com or via our forums at: www.greytale.com.","Brimstone":"Brimstone Presents: Incendium Lava Tiles These map tiles are provided under the Creative Commons Accreditation, Share Alike, Non-commercial licence (CC-BY-NC-SA). You may use them for your own purposes and share them on the internet, as long as their origin is credited. You are also not allowed to sell them, or a work derived from them. If you would like these map tiles for a commercial purpose, please contact me at: rdpatten@gmail.com. INCENDIUM LAVA TILES were made with the assistance of CGTextures. Thank You!","Jshock":"These tiles and images were created by Jonathan Shockley for release with the stable version of maptool 1.3. They are licensed for re-use and distribution under the Creative Commons share-alike, non-commercial, attribution license: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/","ProBono":"License: CREDITS: Tiles were made 100% in Dundjinni map creating progam, with Paint.Net used to crop the final tiles. Thanks to all the artists there and on RpgMapShare for their inspiration and contributions. Particular thanks to Bogie and Neyjour. I would also like to thank Greytale, for allowing me to use some of his artwork at: http://www.greytale.com FAIR USE: You may use these tiles in your personal or commercial works, with the limitations below: IMPORTANT: - You may not extract textures for use as stand alone items. - You must credit \"CGTextures.com\" . [One or more textures in this pack have been created with images from CGTextures.com. These images may not be redistributed by default, please visit http://www.cgtextures.com for more information.] - You must credit \"greytale.com\" since some of the images within were created by Greytale. These images may not be redistributed by default, so please visit http://greytale.com/wp/?page_id=867 for more information. It would be nice, but not required, to credit \"Dundjinni.com\", \"RpgMapShare.com\", and \"Paint.Net\". Some of the modders also used \"GIMP\" and \"PhotoShop\". Norman MacKenzie (ProBono) 2012.","Steel General":"These token images were created by Steel General for release with the stable version of maptool 1.3. They are licensed for re-use and distribution under the Creative Commons share-alike, non-commercial, attribution license: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/ Please visit us at: www.cartographersguild.com","Wyrframe":"License: Shade Tiles (C) Tiogshi Laj (moonshotsoftware.org) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ CREDITS: tiles were made in Blender, and some tiles post-processed using The GIMP. FAIR USE: You may use these tiles in your personal or commercial works, provided you credit the original author (Tiogshi Laj). Derivative works using these tiles may be distributed only if they are distributed using a Creative Commons By Attribution-ShareAlike license, or a more restrictive equivalent License. See http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ In distributing any derivative works, it would be nice, but not required, to also credit RPTools.net, The GIMP Project, and the Blender Foundation. These tiles are specially designed to be used with the Dungeon Builder 2, but can be used seperately as well. The following credits are due: - 6x6 Tiles design: Wolph42 - All Tiles creation: Wyrframe - 6x6 Tiles processing: Wolph42 In addition to these, Wolph42 added 3 'vision blocking layer (VBL) versions for EACH tile to the Dungeon Builder 2 Database.","WOTC OGL1.1":"OPEN GAME LICENSE Version 1.0a The following text is the property of Wizards of the Coast, Inc. and is Copyright 2000 Wizards of the Coast, Inc (\"Wizards\"). net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: licencesProp = getLibProperty("Licenses", "Lib:Licensing")]
[h: licencesIndex = json.fields(licencesProp)]
[h: status = input( "indexChoice|"+licencesIndex+"|Which license do you wish to replace|RADIO|ORIENT=V SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING" ) ] [h: abort(status)]
[h: licenseText = json.get(licencesProp, indexChoice)]
[h: status = input( "newLicenseText|0|New "+indexChoice+" License Text" ) ] [h: abort(status)]
[h: licencesProp = json.set(licencesProp, indexChoice, newLicenseText)]
[h: setLibProperty("Licenses", licencesProp, "Lib:Licensing")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Replace Licence
View Licensing
Delete Licensing

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: licencesProp = getLibProperty("Licenses", "Lib:Licensing")] [h: licencesIndex = json.fields(licencesProp)] [h: status = input( "junk|Apply License to Selected Tokens.

|-|LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "licenseSelection|"+licencesIndex+"|Available Licenses|RADIO|SELECT=0 ORIENT=V VALUE=STRING" ) ] [h: abort(status)] [h: licenseText = json.get(licencesProp, licenseSelection)] [h: selectedTokens = getSelected()] [h, FOREACH(tokID, selectedTokens), CODE: { [h: setProperty("license", licenseText, tokID)] [h: tokName = getName(tokID)] [h: output = strformat("%{tokName} licensing set to %{licenseSelection}.")] [h: broadcast(output)] } ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Set License

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: licencesProp = getLibProperty("Licenses", "Lib:Licensing")] [h: licencesIndex = json.fields(licencesProp)] [h: status = input( "junk|Available Licenses: "+licencesIndex+"

|-|LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "junk|Add new License below.

|-|LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "licenseName|0|License Name", "licenseText|0|License Text" ) ] [h: abort(status)] [h: licencesProp = json.set(licencesProp, licenseName, licenseText)] [h: setLibProperty("Licenses", licencesProp, "Lib:Licensing")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Add License
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Add New License to License Library.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: licencesProp = getLibProperty("Licenses", "Lib:Licensing")]
[h: licencesIndex = json.fields(licencesProp)]
[h: status = input( "indexChoice|"+licencesIndex+"|Which license do you wish to Delete|RADIO|ORIENT=V SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING" ) ] [h: abort(status)]
[h: licencesProp = json.remove(licencesProp, indexChoice)]
[h: setLibProperty("Licenses", licencesProp, "Lib:Licensing")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Delete Licence
